attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Name of the main river system (if the river is a tributary, part of a large river)
River Scale Based on Natural Earth Data

descript.abstract: High Resolution River Center Polylines of Selected Global Large River Systems
descript.purpose: High Resolution River Center Polylines of Selected Global Large River Systems for spatial analysis, visuatization.
